purpose: Enhance agent capabilities by providing a local memory and knowledge base system.
principle: Built using Go, it stores and retrieves information locally to support agent memory functions.
reusability: Designed as a standalone component that can be integrated into various agent systems, with a WebUI for easy interaction.
limitations: Limited to local storage; lacks cloud-based synchronization and scalability features.
name: LocalRecall
description: :brain: 100% Local Memory layer and Knowledge base for agents with WebUI
highlight: Provides a local memory layer and knowledge base for agents with a user-friendly WebUI.
